post.description: This route is replaced with users/@me/mfa/codes-verification in newer clients

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: max number of members to return (1-1000). default 1

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of registration tokens to generate. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: The length of each registration token. Defaults to 255.
